title: Kerata Basa Schema
description: JSON Schema for Javanese etymological philosophy (Kerata Basa/Jarwo Dosok)

id.description: Unique identifier for the entry (e.g., kb_001, kb_002)

category.description: The category of the word (e.g., Anatomi, Social, etc.)

kerata_basa.description: The etymological breakdown or acronym interpretation

philosophy.description: The philosophical meaning derived from the breakdown
